# ggsegICBM

<!-- badges: start -->
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/250281676.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/250281676)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegICBM/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegICBM/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

Contains the ICBM DTI-81 white matter atlas for the ggseg plotting ecosystem.

Mori et al., MRI Atlas of Human White Matter. Elsevier, Amsterdam, The Netherlands (2005)
[Elsevier](https://www.elsevier.com/books/mri-atlas-of-human-white-matter/mori/978-0-444-51741-8)

## Installation

We recommend installing the ggseg-atlases through the ggseg
[r-universe](https://ggseg.r-universe.dev/ui#builds):

```{r}
#| label: install-r-universe
#| eval: false
options(repos = c(
  ggseg = "https://ggseg.r-universe.dev",
  CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"
))

install.packages("ggsegICBM")
```

You can install ggsegICBM from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ggseg/ggsegICBM")
```

## Example

```{r}
#| label: load
library(ggsegICBM)
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-example
#| eval: false
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = icbm()) |>
  pan_camera("right lateral")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-snapshot
#| include: false
#| eval: !expr (file.exists(Sys.which("chrome")) || file.exists(Sys.which("chromium"))) && !nzchar(Sys.getenv("CI"))
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = icbm()) |>
  pan_camera("right lateral") |>
  snapshot_brain("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-include
#| echo: false
#| eval: !expr file.exists("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```
